org.lightningj.paywall.vo.amount

Class BTC

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.JSONParsable
      • org.lightningj.paywall.vo.amount.Amount
        • org.lightningj.paywall.vo.amount.CryptoAmount
          • org.lightningj.paywall.vo.amount.BTC

  • public class BTC
extends CryptoAmount
    Crypto amount denominated in BTC. i.e using "BTC" as currencyCode. Value amount is in satosis. Created by Philip Vendil on 2018-11-11.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.lightningj.paywall.vo.amount.CryptoAmount

        CURRENCY_CODE_BTC, CURRENCY_CODE_LTC, currencyCode, magnetude, value

      • Fields inherited from class org.lightningj.paywall.vo.amount.Amount

        type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BTC()
      Empty Constructor
      BTC(javax.json.JsonObject jsonObject)
      JSON Parseable constructor
      BTC(long value)
      Default Constructor with amount in without magnitude
      BTC(long value, Magnetude magnetude)
      Default Constructor with amount in satoshis with magnitude parameter in order to specify sub satoshi amounts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BTC

        public BTC()
        Empty Constructor

      • BTC

        public BTC(long value)
        Default Constructor with amount in without magnitude
        Parameters:
        value - amount in satoshis

      • BTC

        public BTC(long value,
           Magnetude magnetude)
        Default Constructor with amount in satoshis with magnitude parameter in order to specify sub satoshi amounts.
        Parameters:
        value - amount in satoshis
        magnetude - If sub units to the value it is possible to specify a magnitude. for example set to MILLI for millisatoshis for BTC.

      • BTC

        JSON Parseable constructor
        Parameters:
        jsonObject - the jsonObject to parse.
        Throws:
        javax.json.JsonException - if problems occurred parsing the json data.
